price: ቁርኣንን አያስተነትኑምን ከአላህ ሌላ ዘንድ በነበረ ኖሮ በርሱ ውስጥ ብዙን መለያየት ባገኙ ነበር፡፡
arabic: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَۚ وَلَوۡ كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ غَيۡرِ ٱللَّهِ لَوَجَدُواْ فِيهِ ٱخۡتِلَٰفٗا كَثِيرٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afalā yatadabbarūna al-qur'āna walaw kāna min ʿindi ghayri al-lahi lawajadū fīhi ikh'tilāfan kathīran
